examples: He cleared out the coals from under the staircase, built a neat fire of firewood and paper there, he splashed about paraffine and arranged the lamps and can even as he had designed, and made a fine inflammable pile of things in the little parlour behind the shop.

verbs.description: paraffine (third-person singular simple present paraffines, present participle paraffining, simple past and past participle paraffined)
